actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment for any emergency inpatient hospital services furnished in Canada or Mexico to individuals entitled to hospital insurance benefits.

summary.text: Authorizes payment, under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, for any emergency inpatient hospital services furnished in Canada or Mexico to individuals entitled to hospital insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment for any emergency inpatient hospital services furnished in Canada or Mexico to individuals entitled to hospital insurance benefits.
